content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_device
GO
-- create view for device views
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_device
AS
    SELECT
    dev.filepath(1) as device,
    dev.filepath(2) as year,
    dev.filepath(3) as month,
    dev.filepath(4) as day,
    date_key = convert(int, convert(varchar(10), timestamp, 112)) ,
    dev.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/silver/DEVICE/Device=*/year=*/month=*/day=*/*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'oxemarine_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
    WITH (
        timestamp datetime2(0) ,
        ActualClutchSlip SMALLINT ,
        ControlheadPosition SMALLINT ,
        PropellerSpeed FLOAT ,
        RequestClutchSlip SMALLINT ,
        EngineSpeed FLOAT ,
        BoostPressure FLOAT ,
        PttTrim SMALLINT ,
        GearboxOilPressure FLOAT ,
        GearboxGear SMALLINT ,
        PressureSource SMALLINT ,
        AtmosphericPressure FLOAT ,
        _GearboxOilPressure FLOAT ,
	    _EngineOilPressure FLOAT ,
	    FuelRailPressure FLOAT ,
	    TemperatueSource SMALLINT ,
	    IntakeManifoldTemp FLOAT ,
	    EcuTemp FLOAT 
    
    ) AS [dev]
GO

exec sp_refreshview @viewname='silver.vw_device'


select * from silver.vw_device
where device='4CC52878' and year=2023 and month=03 and day=01
order by timestamp

SELECT * FROM silver.dbc_lookup
select * from silver.calendar
